assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The NTR study was approved by the Central Ethics Committee on Research Involving Human Subjects of the VU University Medical Center, Amsterdam (institutional review board [IRB] number IRB-2991 under Federal wide Assurance 3703; IRB/institute code NTR 03-180). All participants provided written informed consent.
